data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This simple module gives the ability to see the sequence of the
    sessions, because it is auto-incrementing. It is based on a file
    counter, so it is not very resource-efficient.However, for debugging
    purpose, it is a great tool. Being in the Apache::Session framework,
    it makes later switch to more efficient session ID generation very
    easy.
